channel.title: Few Questions
channel.description:
[s]Okay, well, I know how to add an object, but how do i make it so when you click on it, it gives you exp in a skill? Try to be kinda specific dont just say "Add a case" or something like that. [/s] ALSO,christmas crackers only give you 1gp, how do i fix it? ANOTHER THING,How do i change the max amount of money/items?LASTLY, the magics hit the npc's just fine BUT...when you attack a person with them, they splash 90% of the time, is there a way i can fix it? Thanks for any of your help! :)
P.S. I'm Using a "Satan's Isle" source, if that helps at all ;)

item.title: Few Questions
item.dc:creator: @tyguy tyguy
item.description:
@tyguy wrote:

To change what a chrismas thing gives you…

open item.java you may have more than one like item2.java but you need just the first one item.java

Then serch for

public static int crackers[] = {

After the { and before the other } put in there what you want it to give you so say you wanted every phat and ween mask do this

find

public static int crackers[] = {

replace with this

public static int crackers[] = {1038,1040,1042,1044,1046,1048,1050,1053,1055,1057};

and there you go…

Read full topic

what’s wrong with it? o.O

item.title: Few Questions
item.dc:creator: @ownage_plz ownage plz
item.description:
@ownage_plz wrote:

add a case
and in it put addSkillXp(int amount, int skill);

so it would look like

case ####: addSkillXp(int amount, int skill); break;

change the #'s to the object id

you might also want to add an actiontimer that way people can’t mass

so you would add if (actionTimer == 0) {
and

actionTimer = ##

change the #'s the time time delay
NOTE: the number divided by 10 is how many seconds it will take
so 40 would be 4 seconds

so it would look like this

case ####: if(actionTimer == 0) { addSkillXp(int amount, int skill); actionTimer = ##; } break;

Read full topic
